description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic informational endpoints such as root greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for a notes application, including welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Endpoint returning a welcome message for the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Endpoint redirecting to Swagger UI documentation, preserving original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Health check endpoint returning application status 'OK'.
